bwwExcerpt: Director Jack O'Brien's new revival of Rodgers & Hammerstein's 1945 smash stars several of the hottest actors currently gracing the Great White Way (Jessie Mueller and Joshua Henry, for starters), features the work of a hot young choreographer in Justin Peck, and includes a number of classic songs, but none of that can make up for the show's one key problem: The story is Just. Plain. Bad.
